00061 void RecordMachineParams::Streamer(TBuffer &R__b)
00062 {
00063    // Stream an object of class RecordMachineParams.
00064 
00065    //UInt_t R__s, R__c;

00069       R__b.ReadStaticArray((int*)fCavity197MHzVoltage);

00156 void TRecordConfigRhicStruct::Streamer(TBuffer &buf)
00157 {
00158    if (buf.IsReading()) {
00159       //printf("reading TRecordConfigRhicStruct::Streamer(TBuffer &buf) \n");
00160       //if (!this) { printf("reading error: this=0 \n"); exit(-1); }
00161       buf >> header.len;
00162       buf >> data.WFDTUnit;
00163       //Int_t = tmp;
00164       //buf >> tmp; data.CSR.split = tmp
00165       buf >> data.CSR.WFDMode;
00166       //printf("data.CSR: %#x, %#x, %#x, %#x, %#x\n", data.CSR.WFDMode, data.CSR.reg,
00167       //       data.CSR.split.iDiv, data.CSR.split.Mode, (data.CSR.WFDMode&0x0C));
00168       buf >> data.NumChannels;
00169       // Now we know the number of channels saved;
00170       for (int i=0; i!=data.NumChannels; i++) {
00171          buf >> data.chan[i].t0;
00172          buf >> data.chan[i].ecoef;
00173          buf >> data.chan[i].edead;
00174          buf >> data.chan[i].A0;
00175          buf >> data.chan[i].A1;
00176          buf >> data.chan[i].acoef;
00177          buf >> data.chan[i].dwidth;
00178       }
00179    } else {
00180       //printf("writing TRecordConfigRhicStruct::Streamer(TBuffer &buf) \n");
00181       //if (!this) { printf("error this=0 \n"); exit(-1); }
00182       // this one has to go first so we know how much memmory to allocate when reading
00183       buf << data.NumChannels;
00184       buf << header.len ;
00185       buf << data.WFDTUnit ;
00186       buf << data.CSR.WFDMode; // split, WFDMode, reg - union
00187       //printf("data.CSR: %#x, %#x, %#x, %#x, %#x\n", data.CSR.WFDMode, data.CSR.reg,
00188       //       data.CSR.split.iDiv, data.CSR.split.Mode, (data.CSR.WFDMode&0x0C));
00189       buf << data.NumChannels;
00190       for (int i=0; i!=data.NumChannels; i++) {
00191          buf << data.chan[i].t0;
00192          buf << data.chan[i].ecoef;
00193          buf << data.chan[i].edead;
00194          buf << data.chan[i].A0;
00195          buf << data.chan[i].A1;
00196          buf << data.chan[i].acoef;
00197          buf << data.chan[i].dwidth;
00198       }
00199    }
00200 }
